title: Jeremy Kyle Show guest PROPOSES - but it all goes horribly wrong when he puts ring on wrong hand
text:
Jeremy Kyle Show guest PROPOSES - but it all goes horribly wrong when he puts ring on wrong hand The ITV show was faced with very cringey scenes   Share   Comments By Hayley Minn 10:20, 23 FEB 2017 Updated 10:43, 23 FEB 2017 TV Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Jeremy Kyle: He's fathered two love children - bu Watch this video again Watch Next Kyle guest thinks partner cheated because golden 0:23 Jeremy Kyle guest has heartbreaking reaction to s 0:51 Jeremy Kyle: Twitter goes wild as hunky new secur 0:45 Jeremy Kyle: Guest turns up strung out on 'cocain 0:44 Jeremy Kyle: Viewers baffled by guest's thick Iri 0:40 Jeremy Kyle viewers shocked by what guest 'eating 0:32 Jeremy Kyle: Viewers baffled at guest's 'Incredib 0:54 Paternity test reveals mum doesn't know her child 0:39 Jeremy Kyle: Shock as screaming guest labels Jezz 0:22 Man accuses fiancee of cheating because she 'smel 0:43 Jeremy Kyle guest cancels wedding after shock lie 0:38 Video will play in  Is this the most awkward proposal in Jezza history? Share this video Watch Next     celebs   The Jeremy Kyle Show saw a marriage proposal in today’s show - but it went horribly wrong! 
Rob asked his girlfriend - who’s pregnant with a second child with her ex Craig - to be his wife, after passing a lie detector to prove he hadn’t cheated on her.
He told Jeremy : “I love her with all my heart.” 
But, he didn’t quite get the answer he’d hoped for from her.
Read More Jeremy Kyle Show guest accuses boyfriend of cheating due to missing golden condom and 'smell of sex' Rob proposed on the Jeremy Kyle Show (Photo: ITV) It came after he passed the lie detector test (Photo: ITV) But it all went horribly wrong (Photo: ITV) She said no (Photo: ITV) She replied: “I ain’t saying yes until you change. I won’t say yes until you’ve completely changed.”
She continued: “He accuses me of cheating every single day and he’s got to get a job as well.
“He needs to sort his life out.”
The proposal rejection may also have been down to the fact that Rob didn’t have a ring and once he was given one by a member of the audience.
And when he did get one, he put it on the wrong hand - which viewers were very quick to pick up on.
Read More Jeremy Kyle's ex-wife searches for new nanny for kids after TV star moved in with the last one And he put the ring on the wrong hand (Photo: ITV) Jeremy wasn't impressed at all! (Photo: ITV) One said: “Is it just me or was he about to put that ring on her wrong hand?? Haha #jeremykyle CRINGEEE.”
Another added: “The guy on jeremy kyle has jst propose to his gf & went to put the ring on her finger & it's the wrong hand n she's no even noticed (sic).”
A third shared: “Someone tell that poor lad an engagement ring goes on the left hand not the right.”
*The Jeremy Kyle Show continues on ITV1 weekdays at 9.25am
